name: Homepage
body:
# LyokoTech

LyokoTech is a name I picked a long time ago.  It was, in my mind, my personification of technological skill.  I took the name and plan to use it to create an organization for all of my business needs.  The first thing you need to know is who I am.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
